Name: Amber Nectar
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
STIR honey with Scotch in base of shaker until honey dissolves.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Honey lifts and enhances this blend of Scotch whisky, single Islay malt and dry vermouth.
History: Adapted by yours truly from a cocktail promoted in 2013 by Bols, the Dutch liqueur producer. Originally based on vodka with Bols honey liqueur, the honey cried out for blended Scotch whisky and then some Islay single malt.
